movie.title: Good People
movie.writer: Marcus Sakey (based on the novel by), Kelly Masterson (screenplay)
movie.actors: Sam Spruell, Michael Fox, Diarmaid Murtagh, Francis Magee
movie.plot: Discovering a cache of cash in their dead tenant's apt, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary-the thief who stole it.
